Pre-Game Insights: India and Ireland are set to lock horns in their first assignment of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played on June 5, 2024, at 08:00 PM IST.Star Sports Network and Disney Plus Hotstar have the rights to live telecast and online streaming.The likely playing XIs include key players like Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, Jasprit Bumrah for India, and Paul Stirling, George Dockrell for Ireland.The match is significant as it's India's opening game in the tournament.
